item.title: Azure Functions Best Practices for Performance, Reliability and Security
item.description: Building Microservice and Serverless architectures demand different design patterns to be used that other traditional application architectures. Even the older SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) design has different demands than the newer Microservices and Serverless solutions do today. Due to these differences, there are different things to keep in mind when building Microservice and Serverless architectures [â€¦] The article Azure Functions Best Practices for Performance, Reliability and Security was originally published on Build5Nines.
